text: South Florida Muslim Leader Sofian Zakkout’s David Duke Day
David Duke, the white supremacist icon and former Grand Wizard of the Ku Klux Klan, has been denounced by many as a hatemonger, and rightfully so.

span: Grand Wizard of the Ku Klux Klan

text: However, one individual who represents the Muslim community of South Florida, Sofian Zakkout, is enamored with Duke and has been promoting Duke’s bigoted work for many years.
